title: [LFT] JG Main in need of serious ranked team
body:
Hey guys,

Im a plat jungle main, and am really to join a serious ranked team who play frequently. I can play most meta champs and am more than willing to learn anymore that are required. I believe I have great decision making and shot calling. More than happy to trial, and to just be a sub for a team, add my ign: Brussknopp, if you want anymore details.

replies.body: hey mate were a b1 team but we have all silver players and some plat need a good shot caller and jg main to climb us up and higher. let me know if interested
